text: Berthoud, CO Pizza Hut is a good choice for pizza. I enjoy the 3 toppings pan pizza for $11.83 including tax that I order on a regular basis. I always pick up my pizza so I can't comment on their delivery. I  reccomend this Pizza Hut to my ‚Ä¶More

name: Julian Kaiser
text: Even though this review is written during the times of Coronavirus, I can vouch that the service is still good. Not to mention, during normal times the service and food is still good. (As good as Pizza Hut can be)

name: Samantha Meadows
text: I failed to get my delivery drivers name, but she had blue hair. She was fabulous and very sweet! And honestly, I just wanted to say I hope you get into cosmetology school!

name: Samuel Bisson
text: Nice vibes and super welcoming service. The meals were fresh and delightful. Will absolutely recommend this place to others. Reasonable prices and large meals. Great job.

name: Octavia Roth
text: Lost and never Delivered my order. I called after 40 min to inquire, was told it was  on its way... after 1 1/2 hours I was rudely told if it wasn't delivered,  If I want a refund I need to come in, went in and was treated like I was an inconvenience.... not again...

name: Todd Adler
text: Nice, did not even have to get out of the car

name: Matthew Parsley
text: Love their service delivered in my suv without physically enter the building.

name: Josue Manriquez
text: Went twice and they didn't get my order right neither of times. I can't driving back to fix something as getting my order right.. furthermore I got charged like 4 times what I ordered. Dont know if that's their fault or not but don't help with the experience.

name: Jona DeWall
text: First time ordering from this location. User friendly online ordering. Fast & friendly delivery, hot and fresh food!

name: Lisa Blair
text: Today I ordered 2 pizza for pick up. Both were under cooked.. Doughy cheese not melted. Sorry folks it was horrible. Staff was nice and friendly.... Today 2 weeks later, we received a very fresh hot and tasty pizza. The young man who delivered was friendly and polite!  Thank You

name: John Terrell
text: Just stopped in out of convenience hoping that the pizza had improved since my last visit and nothing has changed. If anything, it is even worse than I remember. The fact that pizza hut is in business blows my mind...Even fresh from the oven, this is the worst pizza I have ever eaten.

name: Elizabeth Sweatt
text: Super fast and friendly service

name: Trigirl C
text: Always perfect! Incredible customer service! I call in, and its ready on time, perfectly cooked! Great option for a family with 3 hungry boys helping build a house!

text: Very slow service

text: Food was great, service was great, price was right

name: Wallace

text: Food is hot and fresh as long as you get there right when they say it is ready

text: Appetizers and wings are better than the pizza. Only reason I keep going is the breadsticks.

name: Howard Hork
text: I'm older and can't always drive to get my pizza. Deliver driver Eric gets my order right every time quickly with great customer service. Love the pizza too.

text: Well it's a Pizza Hut and you kind of think they're all the same but the Berthoud one has been really lousy for many years. But now they have new ownership and it seems to be managed better and it's coming up to par with the rest of the national chains of Pizza Huts.

text: This Pizza Hut actually scares me. The food tastes so bad and the employees are so sketchy. the atmosphere feels...wrong. I would never eat here again. It's just all around so bad. Definitely needs to close.

text: I have made the mistake of giving this pizza hut multiple chances, simply because they deliver to my address and the one in loveland doesnt. name: Nina Sherrer
text: Our annual dog show is held in a park in Berthoud and on Saturday, May 7, 2016, we ordered pizza from Pizza Hut. We ordered 4-5 pizza's.  They were done to perfection and extremely delicious!  The order was ready on time and the employees were friendly and courteous.  Thanks Berthoud Pizza Hut!

name: Patty Kemp
text: The pizza was excellent tasting and the service was friendly and fast for pick up.  The store was clean and well lit.

name: Simon Damberger
text: Pizza Hut pizza makes me feel ill and I love pizza! The Berthoud Pizza Hut is pretty typical for the chain. I haven't been there in a while but it always seemed a bit grimy and the atmosphere is poor.

name: Tyler King
text: Guess it was good pizza lmfao

name: Jason Jackson
text: The pizza was great, when it was delivered it was warm and it came right on time. The people who I encountered were very friendly and the experience overall was good.

text: Ordered carryout several times and every time I've been into the restaurant it is very dirty and not a very pleasant smell. Very outdated. ‚Ä¶More
